name: test_e2e_with_logs[484_CRLF_HDR_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_HDR_004` |
| **Name** | CORS Header Injection via Uppercase CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | header_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nAccess-Control-Allow-Origin:*`
- **Encoded**: `%0D%0AAccess-Control-Allow-Origin%3A*`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~6000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:06:36.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected test_id=CRLF_HDR_004-1771059996566-19i7id pattern_id=CRLF_HDR_004 uri=/?q=%0D%0AAccess-Control-Allow-Origin%3A* client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
